alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 24 at 8:25PM CDT until August 25 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FIRE DANGER CONTINUES FRIDAY... Critically dry fuels will combine with low relative humidity values and gusty winds, especially during the afternoon, to produce an extreme fire danger. Fires will have erratic and explosive growth behavior. Remember burn bans are in effect for the entire area as the severe to exceptional drought conditions continues. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CDT FRIDAY FOR LOWER ACADIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Louisiana...Fire weather zones 044, 045, 055, 152, 153, and 154. * WIND... SOUTHERLY 10 TO 15 MPH * HUMIDITY...30 TO 40 PERCENT * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion
